The New Jaguar F\-type

Jaguar has silently launched the 2020 facelifted F\-Type n India\. The price range kicks off from ₹92\.5 Lakh and goes until ₹2\.41 Crores \(ex\-showroom price\)\. This car is offered in 2 body types a Coupe and a Convertible\.  This car will be available in 9 variants which will include 6 coupes and 3 convertibles trims\. This car was first introduced in the year 2019 and it competes with its German rivals like the Porsche Boxster and the 718 Cayman\. 

The various trims in the new Jaguar F\-Type are:

- __[F\-Type 2\.0 l Coupe](https://www.carandbike.com/jaguar-cars/f-type/20-l-coupe" \o "F-Type 2.0 l Coupe)__

- ₹ 95\.12 Lakh

1997 cc, Petrol, Automatic, 15\.3 Km/l

Talking about the Engine on the Jaguar F\-type

There Are 2 engine variants in the Facelifted F\-Type the range starts from a 2\.0L turbocharged in\-line 4 cyl petrol engine which puts out 296HP and 400Nm of torque at its peak\. Then comes the 5\.0L Supercharged V8 which puts out 444Hp and 580Nm of torque at max\.

The 2\.0L engine can max out at the top speed of 250kmph and 0\-100 takes about 5\.7 seconds\. This engine is mated to an 8\-speed\-automated gearbox and drives the rear wheels only\.

The 5\.0L supercharged V8 can max out at 285 kmph, 0\-100 in about 4\.6 seconds this is powered by the same 8\-speed\-automated Gearbox which sends power to the rear wheels only\. However, the Range Topping R\-Dynamic version also has a 5\.0L Supercharged V8 but this time it's tuned to 575 HP and 700Nm of torque\. The R\-Dynamic version is available with a Rear\-wheel drive or All\-wheel drive system\. This range\-topping version can reach from naught to 100kmph in just 3\.7 Seconds before reaching 300kmph\. 

The exterior of the car

The New facelifted Jaguar gets a whole new set of things like the new Headlamps, a new aggressive sports car\-like Grille \(It is a sports car\)\. New Front and rear bumpers with larger air intakes, new tail lamps with a J pattern to make it look a bit more Aggressive and to give a new sporty feel to the car\.

Interior of the Jaguar F\-type

Inside the car, there isn't soo much difference\. The updates come with a new digital instrument console with a much better infotainment system with a larger display, now it also comes with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto as standard\. There are 12\-way electrically controlled front seats with memory function and a new leather interior which is far better than the Old F\-Type\. The latest model even gets the leather\-wrapped steering wheel, cabin lighting, and a switchable exhaust which can alter the sound\. The seats are pretty comfy for long journeys\. The steering's nice and light which makes its handling better; the driver can feel what's going on underneath the car when he puts his foot down\.

Good Things

- 
	- Fabulous design
	- Blistering performance from the V8 motor
	- Sure\-footed and fun\-to\-drive

Could be Better

- 
	- Small boot
	- Not as agile as competition
	- Hesitant auto gearbox

The Final Verdict:

 So, what’s the final verdict

- Should you avoid the F\-type\.
- Should you Consider the F\-Type\.
- Should you Shortlist the F\-Type\.
- Or Should you Buy the F\-Type?

Well, we reckon you should Shortlist the new Jaguar F\-Type because the 5\.0L V8 gives blistering performance it just doesn’t seem to match its German Competitors in the Interiors, it just doesn’t stand out like the Porsche 718 Cayman or the Boxster\.
